heading: 1 Introduction
text:
R markdown lets write reproducible documents interwoven code text.
book written R markdown.

heading: Before you start
text: Chapters 1 - 4 tutorial introduce R markdown, tool lets combine code text write reproducible documents.Chapters 5 6 show author manuscript, report thesis R markdown.need installedRStudioR

heading: 2.1 Why you should use R markdown
text:
traditional way write paper run analyses R software copy figures, tables etc. word processor.
find error code data need repeat process.
Repeatedly.inefficient error prone.R markdown lets code text one document.
code data updated, new versions figures tables automatically generated inserted corrected document.much reproducible process.

heading: 2.2 Creating and knitting an R markdown file
text:
R markdown file plain text file.
can create new text file, give “.Rmd” extension, start typing.
better use RStudio.Go “File” menu bar, “New File,” “R Markdown….”
first time , may asked install extra packages.
Now pop-window asking Title, author output format (Fig. 2.1).
Figure 2.1: Choose output format
can fill now, edit document later.
recommend start “HTML” format doesn’t require anything else installed.
ready, click OK, new R markdown file open.
look something like Figure 2.2
Figure 2.2: default R markdown document.
learn elements file section 3.

going analyse droughts Bergen (raises fire risk coastal heathland (lynghei)).

can use RStudio Addin package ymlthis help write YAML.

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.1.1 R code in YAML
text:
possible add R code YAML, example show current date.
R code needs enclosed quote marks back-ticks r code.
code contains quotemarks, need different enclosing quotemarks (.e. single vs double quotes).See data-time tutorial codes "%d %B %Y".

text: Make R markdown document show today’s date knitted.

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.1.2 Output formats
text:
R markdown documents can rendered many different output formats, includingpresentations (xaringan::moon_reader ioslides)posters (posterdown)books (bookdown).theses (thesisdown)tutorial focuses document-like reports.choice output format documents.
can specified R markdown file created RStudio editing YAML.Producing html file view browser simplest, nothing extra needs installing.
YAML look something like .Word documents also easy; just change output word_document.
can useful supervisor collaborators cope R markdown directly, consider using redoc package lets convert edited word document back R markdown.Rendering R markdown file PDF requires external tools (LaTeX) installed (don’t need learn LaTeX).
can done tinytxt package.output format YAML can changed pdf_document.
PDF documents, can tricky control exactly figures positioned, recommend working html long possible.
code:
---title: "My Manuscript"output: html_document---
# run this only once
install.packages('tinytex')
tinytex::install_tinytex()

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.2 Text
text:
Type make text!
RStudio built-spell checker underline words doesn’t recognise red.
Go “Tools” >> “Global Options…” >> “Spelling” change language.Paragraphs blank line .
good practice write one sentence per line.
extra line breaks removed document knitted.
want force line break, put two spaces end line.Formatting generated special characters.
example:# Title
## Subtitle
### Sub-subtitle
*italic* _italics_
**bold** __bold__
Superscript m^2^
Subscript CO~2~actually want #*_^~ text, need escape putting backslash \ , e.g. \#.don’t like formatting document hand, can use RStudio visual editor clicking grey Å document.complete list given R markdown cheat sheet.

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.3 Code chunks
text:
Code R markdown document contained code chunks.code chunk loads penguin data palmerpenguins package.starts three back-ticks, followed braces.
Inside braces, “r” indicates chunk R language.
next word optional chunk name.
comma optional chunk arguments.
new line body chunk.
chunk ends three back-ticks line.

text:
can type back-ticks braces needed make chunk, easier get RStudio insert chunk.
can +C button use keyboard shortcut ctrl+alt+(mac Command+Option+).

heading: 3.3.3 Chunk names
text:
good idea name chunks.
don’t, automatically called “unnamed-chunk-n” “n” incrementing number.
inconvenient debugging (need work chunk “unnamed-chunk-37”) working image files generated document.
section 6 see use chunk names cross-reference figures tables document.

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.3.3.1 Rules for naming chunks
text:
Chunk names informative can contain letters numbers.
Words separated hyphens (“-”).ImportantAvoid spaces, underscores, periods chunk names.
cause sorts strange problems.

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.3.4 Chunk options
text:
lots chunk options, need use frequently.
default.echo (TRUE) Show chunk’s code output.eval (TRUE) Run chunk code.include (TRUE) Include output chunk document.message (TRUE) Include messages R.warning(TRUE) Include warnings R.error (FALSE) TRUE, shows error message.
FALSE, stops knitting error R code.leave message warning TRUE writing document, can see possible problems, set FALSE knit final version.sometimes find useful set error TRUE can make easier debug errors code.Chunk options figures shown section 4.1.1.Full list http://yihui.name/knitr/options/

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.3.5 Setting default chunk options
text:
Default chunk options can set chunks knitr::opts_chunk$set first chunk.
New R markdown files created RStudio automatically chunk called “setup.”chunk sets echo = TRUE chunks.
include=FALSE stop output chunk included output.

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file

text:
Code chunks run document knitted (unless eval = FALSE), also useful run code interactively check works.
can clicking green play buttons right chunk (Fig. 3.1) Run button document.
code depends previous chunks, grey/green icon run .
Figure 3.1: green run chunk icon grey/green icon run previous chunks.

grey arrow next line numbers .

R knits R markdown documents new R session.
environment empty: R markdown document access objects current environment (good thing reproducible analyses).
means data want use document needs imported code document.working directory new R session used knitting R markdown file directory file .
file root directory RStudio project, relative paths work way R markdown document console.
file sub-directory, use ::() form paths relative project root.

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: Exercise
text:
Download file https://raw.githubusercontent.com/biostats-r/biostats/main/Rmarkdown/data/Florida-precip.csv save RStudio project folder.
file gives monthly precipitation data Florida, Bergen since 1983, extracted https://seklima.met./.
Earlier data available weather station Nordnes.
Make R chunk R markdown document use import file R.Re-read importing data chapter working R book.Check delimiter decimal separator.Make sure Rmarkdown document loads tidyverse.Change column headers easier work .See Working R book section non-standard names suggestions names good.Use col_names argument read_delim() (remember skip old column names)use rename(new_name = `Old Name`)use janitor::clean_names()Convert date column date formatUse col_types argument read_delim()use lubridate::dmy() (check help file see truncated argument)

chapter: 3 Elements of an R markdown file
heading: 3.4 Inline code
text:
addition output chunks code, can insert code directly text.
Inline code enclosed back-ticks starts r.Seven times six 42If want numbers written words, use package english.Seven times six forty-twoIt best keep inline code short keep text readable.
One trick necessary calculation previous chunk, name object result needs inline code.
many results report, consider storing list following example.Bill length body mass Adelie penguins positively correlated, r = 0.55 (df = 149, p < 0.001).
code:
Seven times six is `r 7 * 6`Seven times six is `r english::words(7 * 6)`
cor_adelie <- cor.test(
  ~ bill_length_mm + body_mass_g, 
  data = penguins, 
  subset = species == "Adelie")

adelie_list <- list(
  #degrees of freedom
  df = cor_adelie$parameter,
  # extract correlation and round
  est = round(cor_adelie$estimate, 2),
  #format p.value with an "=" is the first character is not "<". 
  #See the characters tutorial for more on the stringr package and regular expressions.
  p_val = str_replace(
    string = format.pval(cor_adelie$p.value, eps = 0.001),
    pattern = "^(?!<)", 
    replacement = "= ")
)Bill length and body mass in Adelie penguins are positively correlated, r = `r adelie_list$est` (df = `r adelie_list$df`, p `r adelie_list$p_val`).

heading: 4.1 Figures made in R
text: Plots can included chunk makes figure either base plot ggplot.make plot ggplot, remember print .
code:
```{r histogram,  fig.cap = "An embedded figure"}
p <- ggplot(penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm)) + 
  geom_histogram()
p # remember to print the plot
```

heading: 4.1.1 Figure chunk options
text: several useful chunk options figures, including:fig.cap figure caption.fig.height figure height inches (1 inch = 25.4 mm)fig.width figure width inches

heading: 4.2 Embedding external images
text: Photographs figures prepared outside R can included path URL file.![Alt description](image.jpg)much control knitr::include_graphics() lets set caption, adjust size, .Use .width .height chunk options set size figure.

heading: Exercise
text: Write chunk make figure showing annual precipitation cycle.Make second chunk make figure shows summer 2021 compares previous years.Give figures captions.

heading: 4.3 Tables
text:
can make tables markdown hand, much easier use R.Simple tables can made function knitr::kable.
Several packages, including kableExtra gt can make beautiful tables.

heading: 4.3.1 kable
text: Table 4.1: top penguins

heading: 4.3.2 kableExtra
text:
kableExtra extends knitr::kable, letting add extra rows headers, repeating headers table spans multiple pages many features.
Table 4.2: top penguins
reading kableExtra.
code:
library(kableExtra)
penguins |> 
  #rename some columns
  rename(length_mm = bill_length_mm, depth_mm = bill_depth_mm) |> 
  #replace "_" with spaces
  rename_with(str_replace_all,  pattern = "_", replacement = " ") |> 
  #capitalise first letter
  rename_with(str_to_sentence) |> 
  #get first five rows
  slice(1:5) |> 
  kbl(booktabs = TRUE, caption = "The top penguins") |> 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE) |>
  add_header_above(c(" ", " ", "Bill" = 2, "Body" = 2, " ", " "))

heading: 4.3.3 gt
text: gt alternative kableExtra.Table 4.3: Basic gt tableTable 4.3: gt table features
code:
library(gt)
penguins |>
  slice(1:5) |> 
  gt(caption = "Basic gt table")
penguins |>
  slice(1:5) |> 
  rename_with(str_to_sentence) |>
  gt(caption = "gt table with more features") |> 
  cols_label(Bill_length_mm = "Length mm",
             Bill_depth_mm  = "Depth mm",
             Flipper_length_mm = "Flipper length mm", 
             Body_mass_g = "Body mass g") |> 
  tab_spanner(label = "Bill", columns = c(Bill_length_mm, Bill_depth_mm)) |> 
  tab_spanner(label = "Body", columns = c(Flipper_length_mm, Body_mass_g))

text: Write chunk make table showing mean precipitation standard deviation month.

heading: 4.4 Equations
text:
Equations embedded pair dollar symbols.
RStudio show preview equation type .
Equations written LaTeX notation.example using inline equation.\(\delta^{13}C\) value …double dollar enclosure gives equation line.
example, equation standard deviation uses several different elements.\[SD = \sqrt{\frac{\sum_{=1}^{n}{(x_i - \bar{x})^2}}{n-1}}\]making complex formula, build one element time, often starting middle, rather trying get working .

heading: 4.5 Chemistry
text:
Equations printed italic font, great chemical formulae.
can fix \mathrm command forces roman typeface.Sulphate $\mathrm{SO_4^{2-}}$Sulphate \(\mathrm{SO_4^{2-}}\)$$\mathrm{CO_3^{2-} + H^+ \rightleftharpoons HCO_3^{2-}}$$\[\mathrm{CO_3^{2-} + H^+ \rightleftharpoons HCO_3^{2-}}\]

heading: 5 Citations and bibliographies
text:
R markdown can add citations bibliography document.
Use bibliography field YAML point bibliography file.bibliography file can one several formats, including bibTeX (*.bib) endnote (*.enl).
reference manager able export bibTeX file.

heading: 5.1 Bibliography placement
text:
default, bibliography placed end document.
good idea end R markdown file appropriate header.{-} stops R markdown numbering reference section header.want move bibliography, example need finish appendix, need use bit magic.
also need use output format bookdown::html_document2 YAML.
code:
# ConclusionsR markdown is cool.# References {-}# ConclusionsR markdown is very cool.# References {-}
# Appendix A

heading: 5.2 Citations
text:
Use citation keys bibliography cite reference text.
cite reference citation key “Cooper2017” use.output depends csl file.
Using default author-date style givesThe citr package [install GitHub] makes RStudio add-adding citations text bibliograpy.

heading: 5.3 Citation style
text:
don’t like default citation style, want submit manuscript journal overly pedantic editor, can change citation style specifying csl file YAML.csl (Citation Style Language) file defines citation style.
many citation style available http://zotero.org/styles.

heading: 5.4 Citation problems
text:
Unfortunately, can problems bibliography citation.
can solved googling error message.
common problems addressed .

heading: 5.4.1 Incorrect capitalisation
text:
Many CLS styles convert title title case (.e. first letter first word capitalised).
can annoying names (people, countries, species) can given wrong case.paper titlePopulation ecology polar bears Svalbard, Norway.may appear asPopulation ecology polar bears svalbard, norway.can fixed editing bibtex file, putting braces around word capitals need kept.Population ecology polar bears {Svalbard}, {Norway}.

heading: 5.4.2 Accents and other special characters
text:
tool-chain processes R markdown files can sometimes fall accented characters diacritic marks references.
error message look something like thisOne solution edit bibtex file replace accented character escaped code.
example, “í” “Martínez” replaced “\’{}.”
code:
! Package inputenc Error: Unicode character ́ (U+0301)  
(inputenc)                not set up for use with LaTeX.

heading: 6 Cross-referencing
text:
Cross-referencing lets refer figures tables document.
set , happens automatically, don’t need re-number figures add delete one.Cross-referencing needs use bookdown package output, declared YAML.

heading: 6.1 Cross-referencing figures and tables
text:
chunk made figure table needs name (underscores!) caption.
Figure 6.1: Boxplot penguin body mass
cross-reference figure made chunk, need use notation.Penguins cool (Fig. 6.1)refer table made chunk called penguin-results, useNote fig replaced tab reference.get chunk name wrong, warning document knitted, question marks shown reference .Non-existing figure (Fig. ??)
code:
```{r penguin-dens, fig.cap = "Histogram of penguin body mass"}
penguins |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = flipper_length_mm, fill = species)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.7) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set1")
```Penguins are cool (Fig. \@ref(fig:penguin-dens))Penguins are cool (Table \@ref(tab:penguin-results))Figure \@ref(fig:no-exist)) does not exist

example, refer section, useCross-referencing (Section 6.3)Note reference must written lower case spaces must replaced hyphens.
Punctuation deleted.

text: creating PDF, can include line numbers adding header-includes section YAML.LaTeX packages can added similar way add extra functionality, example, pages landscape.

heading: 8.1 Too much or too slow code
text:
code runs slowly, output code chunks can cached, next time document rendered existing cached results can used.
caching system R markdown can activated setting chunk option cache = TRUE.
caching system can tricky set complex projects, targets package much robust framework building reproducible analysis pipelines.
See demonstration project example set targets.

open draft document showing features can use.
Knit , start edit .
Everything learnt formatting R markdown documents, code chunks, figures tables documents applies presentations.New slides xaringan made three minus signs.
must anything else line (even space) draw horizontal line instead.

normal errors working R R markdown.

Chunk names must unique.
